GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14 to before v5.4.224
GSD.description:
capabilities: fix potential memleak on error path from vfs_getxattr_alloc()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.224 by commit 0c3e6288da650d1ec911a259c77bc2d88e498603, it was introduced in version v4.14 by commit 8db6c34f1dbc8e06aa016a9b829b06902c3e1340. For more details please see the references link.
